alert.note: Alert for Garrard; Lincoln; Madison (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lincoln, southeastern Garrard and southwestern Madison Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 426 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Indian Lakes Park, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Lincoln, southwestern Madison and southeastern Garrard Counties, including the following locations... Round Hill, Crab Orchard, Silver Creek, Paint Lick, Bighill, Manse, Ottenheim, Broughtentown, Buggytown and Cartersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central Kentucky.
